00031 void Finder::init()
00032 {
00033         regs_target = new bool[RegistersCount];
00034         memset(regs_target,false,RegistersCount);
00035         data = NULL;
00036         dataSize = 0;
00037 }
00038 void Finder::clear()
00039 {
00040         memset(regs_target,false,RegistersCount);
00041         delete[] data;
00042         data = NULL;
00043         dataSize = 0;
00044 }

00046 void Finder::find() {
00047         INSTRUCTION inst;
00048         for (int i = 0; i < dataSize; i++)
00049         {
00050                 int len = get_instruction(&inst, &data[i], mode);
00051                 if (!len || (len + i > dataSize)) continue;
00052                 if (strcmp(inst.ptr->mnemonic,"call")==0||strcmp(inst.ptr->mnemonic,"fstenv")==0||strcmp(inst.ptr->mnemonic,"fnstenv")==0)
00053                 {
00054                         char string1[256]; 
00055                         get_instruction_string(&inst, format, (DWORD)i, string1, sizeof(string1));
00056                         cout << "Instruction \"" << string1 << "\" on position " << i << "." << endl;
00057                         find_memory(i);
00058                         find_jump(i);
00059                         cout << "*********************************************************" << endl;
00060                 }
00061         }
00062 }

00064 int Finder::find_memory(int pos)
00065 {
00066         INSTRUCTION inst;
00067         int len;
00068         vector <INSTRUCTION> instructions;
00069         for (int p=pos; p<dataSize; p+=len)
00070         {
00071                 len = get_instruction(&inst,&data[p],mode);
00072                 if (!len || (len + p > dataSize))
00073                 {
00074                         p++;
00075                         continue;
00076                 }
00077                 instructions.push_back(inst);
00078                 if (inst.op1.type != OPERAND_TYPE_MEMORY) continue;
00080                 char string1[256];
00081                 get_instruction_string(&inst, format, (DWORD)p, string1, sizeof(string1));
00082                 char *popen = index(string1,'['), *pclose = index(string1,']'), *pcomma = index(string1,',');
00083                 if ((popen==NULL)||(pclose<popen)||(pcomma<pclose)) continue;
00084                 for (int i=0; i<CommandsChangingCount; i++)
00085                         if (strcmp(inst.ptr->mnemonic,CommandsChanging[i])==0)
00086                         {
00087                                 for (int j=0;j<RegistersCount;j++)
00088                                 {
00089                                         char *preg = strstr(string1,Registers[j]);
00090                                         if ((preg<popen)||(pclose<preg)) continue;
00091                                         cout << "Write to memory detected: " << string1 << " on position " << p << endl;
00092                                         get_operands(p);
00093                                         check1(&instructions); // Checking whether operands of target instruction are defined
00094                                         backwards_traversal(pos);
00095                                         print_commands(&instructions,1);
00096                                         memset(regs_target,false,RegistersCount);
00097                                         return p;
00098                                 }
00099                         }
00100         }
00101         return -1;
00102 }

00104 void Finder::check1(vector <INSTRUCTION>* instructions)
00105 {
00106         for (int k=instructions->size()-1;k>=0;k--)
00107         {
00108                 check_inst((*instructions)[k]);
00109         }
00110 }

00112 bool Finder::check2(vector <int>* queue, vector <int>* prev)
00113 {
00114         vector <INSTRUCTION> commands;
00115         get_commands(&commands,queue,prev); 
00116         check1(&commands);
00117         for (int i=0; i<RegistersCount; i++) {
00118                 if (regs_target[i]) return false;
00119         }
00120         return true;
00121 }

00123 void Finder::get_commands(vector <INSTRUCTION>* commands, vector <int>* num_commands, vector <int>* prev)
00124 {
00125         INSTRUCTION inst;
00126         for (int i=num_commands->size()-1;i!=-1;i=(*prev)[i])
00127         {
00128                 get_instruction(&inst,&data[(*num_commands)[i]],mode);
00129                 commands->push_back(inst);
00130         }
00131 }

00133 void Finder::check_inst(INSTRUCTION inst)
00134 {
00135         char string1[256];
00136         get_instruction_string(&inst, format, 0, string1, sizeof(string1));
00137         char *pos_reg, *pos_comma;
00139         switch (inst.type)
00140         {
00141                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_XOR:
00142                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_SUB:
00143                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_SBB:
00144                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_DIV:
00145                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_IDIV:
00146                         pos_comma = index(string1,',');
00147                         for (int i=0; i<RegistersCount; i++)
00148                         {
00149                                 if (!regs_target[i]) continue;
00150                                 pos_reg = strstr(string1,Registers[i]);
00151                                 if ((pos_reg!=NULL)&&(pos_comma>pos_reg)&&(*(pos_reg-1)==' '))
00152                                 {
00153                                         if (strstr(pos_comma,Registers[i])!=NULL)
00154                                         {
00155                                                 regs_target[i] = false;
00156                                         }
00157                                         for (int t=0; t<RegistersCount; t++)
00158                                         {
00159                                                 if (strstr(pos_comma,Registers[t])!=NULL)
00160                                                 {
00161                                                         regs_target[t] = true;
00162                                                         break;
00163                                                 }
00164                                         }
00165                                 }
00166                         }
00167                         break;
00168                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_ADD:
00169                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_AND:
00170                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_OR:
00171                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_MUL:
00172                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_IMUL:
00173                         pos_comma = index(string1,',');
00174                         for (int i=0; i<RegistersCount; i++)
00175                         {
00176                                 if (!regs_target[i]) continue;
00177                                 pos_reg = strstr(string1,Registers[i]);
00178                                 if ((pos_reg!=NULL)&&(pos_comma>pos_reg)&&(*(pos_reg-1)==' '))
00179                                 {
00180                                         for (int t=0; t<RegistersCount; t++)
00181                                         {
00182                                                 if (strstr(pos_comma,Registers[t])!=NULL)
00183                                                 {
00184                                                         regs_target[t] = true;
00185                                                         break;
00186                                                 }
00187                                         }
00188                                 }
00189                         }
00190                         break;
00191                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_MOV:
00192                         pos_comma = index(string1,',');
00193                         for (int i=0; i<RegistersCount; i++)
00194                         {
00195                                 if (!regs_target[i]) continue;
00196                                 pos_reg = strstr(string1,Registers[i]);
00197                                 if ((pos_reg!=NULL)&&(pos_comma>pos_reg)&&(*(pos_reg-1)==' '))
00198                                 {
00199                                         regs_target[i] = false;
00200                                         break;
00201                                 }
00202                         }
00203                         break;
00204                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_POP:
00205                         for (int i=0; i<RegistersCount; i++)
00206                         {
00207                                 if (!regs_target[i]) continue;
00208                                 pos_reg = strstr(string1,Registers[i]);
00209                                 if ((pos_reg!=NULL)&&(*(pos_reg-1)==' '))
00210                                 {
00211                                         regs_target[i] = false;
00212                                         regs_target[ESP] = true;
00213                                         break;
00214                                 }
00215                         }
00216                         break;
00217                 case INSTRUCTION_TYPE_FCMOVC:
00218                         regs_target[ESP] = false;
00219                         break;
00220         }
00221 }

00223 void Finder::print_commands(vector <INSTRUCTION>* v, int start)
00224 {
00225         char string1[256];
00226         int i=0;
00227         vector<INSTRUCTION>::iterator p;
00228         for (vector<INSTRUCTION>::iterator p=v->begin(); p!=v->end(); i++,p++)
00229         {
00230                 if (i<start) continue;
00231                 get_instruction_string(&(*p), format, 0, string1, sizeof(string1));
00232                 cout << string1 << endl;
00233         }
00234 }

00236 void Finder::backwards_traversal(int pos)
00237 {
00238         INSTRUCTION inst;
00239         char string1[256];
00240         int length=1;
00241         bool regs_target_bak[RegistersCount];
00242         memcpy(regs_target_bak,regs_target,RegistersCount);
00243         vector <int> queue, prev;
00244         queue.push_back(pos);
00245         prev.push_back(-1);
00246         for (int cur=0; cur<length;)
00247         {
00248                 for (int i=1;i<=MaxCommandSize;i++)
00249                 {
00250                         if (get_instruction(&inst,&data[queue[cur]-i],mode)==i)
00251                         {
00252                                 queue.push_back(queue[cur]-i);
00253                                 prev.push_back(cur);
00254                                 length++;
00255                                 if (check2(&queue,&prev))
00256                                 {
00257                                         length=0;
00258                                         break;
00259                                 }
00260                                 else
00261                                 {
00262                                         memcpy(regs_target,regs_target_bak,RegistersCount);
00263                                 }
00264                         }
00265                 }
00266                 cur++;
00267         }
00268         vector <INSTRUCTION> commands;
00269         get_commands(&commands,&queue,&prev); 
00270         print_commands(&commands);
00271 }

00273 void Finder::get_operands(int pos)
00274 {
00275         INSTRUCTION inst;
00276         char string1[256], *p;
00277         get_instruction(&inst,&data[pos],mode);
00278         get_instruction_string(&inst,format,(DWORD)pos,string1,sizeof(string1));
00279         for (int i=0; i<RegistersCount; i++)
00280         {
00281                 if (regs_target[i]) continue;
00282                 p = strstr(string1,Registers[i]);
00283                 if (p==NULL) continue;
00284                 switch (*(p-1)) {
00285                         case '[': case ' ': case ',': case '+': case '-':
00286                                 regs_target[i] = true;
00288                                 break;
00289                 }
00290         }
00291 }

00293 int Finder::find_jump(int pos)
00294 {
00295         INSTRUCTION inst;
00296         char string1[256]; 
00297         int len;
00298         for (; pos<dataSize; pos+=len)
00299         {
00300                 len = get_instruction(&inst,&data[pos],mode);
00301                 if (!len || (len + pos > dataSize))
00302                 {
00303                         pos++;
00304                         continue;
00305                 }
00306                 get_instruction_string(&inst, format, (DWORD)pos, string1, sizeof(string1));
00307                 if (string1[0]=='j')
00308                 {
00309                         char *pspace = index(string1,' ');
00310                         if (pspace==NULL) continue;
00311                         for (int i=0; i<RegistersCount; i++)
00312                         {
00313                                 if (strstr(string1,Registers[i]) > pspace)
00314                                 {
00315                                         cout << "Indirect jump detected: " << string1 << " on position " << pos << endl;
00316                                         get_operands(pos);
00317                                         return pos;
00318                                 }
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321         }
00322         return -1;
00323         
00324 }

00326 void Finder::read_file(char *name)
00327 {
00328         clear();
00329         ifstream s(name);
00330         if (!s.good() || s.eof() || !s.is_open()) 
00331         {
00332                 cout << "Error opening file\n";
00333                 return;
00334         }
00335         s.seekg(0, ios_base::beg);
00336         ifstream::pos_type begin_pos = s.tellg();
00337         s.seekg(0, ios_base::end);
00338         dataSize = static_cast<int>(s.tellg() - begin_pos);
00339         s.seekg(0, ios_base::beg);
00340         data = new unsigned char[dataSize];
00341         s.read((char *) data,dataSize);
00342         s.close();
00343 }
